snippet: In 1976, the East German women won every swimming event in Montreal except one--and the U.S. team eventually had their suspicions confirmed about how that happened.
abstract: In 1976, the East German women won every swimming event in Montreal except one--and the U.S. team eventually had their suspicions confirmed about how that happened.

headline.main: Friday Flashback: Against East German Swimmers in '76, a Medal and a Lot of Questions
